description.en:
Share on Google+ the current URL. Click right and click 'Share on Google+'
Do you want to share the current URL in Google+? With Google+ Share you can share the actual URL with the right click button and click to Share on Google+.
description.es: Comparte en Google+ la página actual. Haz click derecho y presiona 'Compartir en Google+'
description.fr: Partager sur Google+ l'URL actuelle. Cliquez à droite et cliquez sur 'Share on Google+'
description.de: Share on Google+ aktuellen Seite. Rechte Maustaste und klicken Sie auf 'Share on Google+'
description.zh: 谷歌 + 当前页的股份。右键单击，单击共享在谷歌 +'
description.ja: Google+で現在のページを共有。右クリックして、「Google+で共有」をクリックし
description.ru: Поделиться на Google+ текущей странице. Щелкните правой кнопкой мыши и выберите «Покажи в Google+ '

changes: Using Australis UI only to fix bugs
Using ActionButtons instead of Widgets on Australis
Added a Hotkey for share on Google+ with the keyboard
